name: Galactic Raiders
description:
Get rich raiding the trade lanes with 1-4 player local multiplayer. You can play on one machine with multiple controllers or online using parsec. Just start the game and plug in your controllers and press a key to have a player join. Each player who joins will remove an AI from the game.

Objective

Destroy merchant ships and steal their gold. Get 100 before the other team does.

Controls

Move - Left Stick or WASD

Laser - Right Trigger or Left Click

Shield - Right Button or Left Shift

Afterburner - Right Trigger or Left Control

Asset Credits

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/2d-space-kit-27662
